name: Gold Diver
description:
Created for the 85th Mini Jam: Gold 

In Gold Diver, you play as a diver looking for gold hidden deep in the ocean.  

YOU ONLY HAVE 60 SECONDS 

You can use the WASD & arrow keys to move.

 The diver cannot hold more than one gold piece at a time, he must make multiple trips to collect every gold. 

The diver can refill his oxygen tank from the extraction baskets found on the uppermost level, and  when he touches the bubbles.

Do you have what it takes to navigate through the trench and find all the 10 gold pieces?

THE TEAM

masgag - Head Programmer & Technical Director

fluffliee- Game Artist & Music Supervisor

antangonist- Gameplay Director, Sprite Animator, Level Designer, Assistant Programmer, & Sound Designer 

MUSIC USED

"Cottages" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) 

"Ethernight Club" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

 "Island Meet and Greet" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

 "Deep Relaxation" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
